entry.title: Reusable Polyester Mask With Filter - Large
entry.summary:
Vendor: OEM
Type: Reusable Mask
Price: 16.99

These ergonomic masks are made of 100% polyester with a polypropylene filter. These filters maintain their filtering power up to 50 washes.

Before first use, wash the mask in hot water (60°C - 75°C) for 30 minutes with detergent to remove any traces of coronavirus present.

Wash after each use - up to 50 washes or 150 hours of use (maximum 3 consecutive hours use recommended).

These non-certified masks are an asset in the fight against Covid-19 by providing an additional barrier and filtering out droplets and particles that may be present in the air. In no way do they replace the prevention measures announced by the government, such as hand washing and social distancing.

  • Made in Quebec
  • Adjusts to all face shapes
  • Washable up to 50 times
  • Easy care, wash in hot water, dry normally
  • Do not move on clothes
  • Very soft fabrics for the face
  • Comfortable for ears and nose

Size  Medium
Mask Material 100% polyester lined knit
Filter Material 100% polypropylene filter
Colour White
